description: Detects SQL error messages that indicate probing for an injection attack
author: Bjoern Kimminich
false_positives: A syntax error in MySQL also occurs in non-dynamic (safe) queries if there is an empty in() clause, that may often be the case.
name: Suspicious SQL Error Messages
query: ((*quoted string not properly terminated*) OR (*You have an error in your SQL syntax*) OR (*Unclosed quotation mark*) OR (*near "*": syntax error*) OR (*SELECTs to the left and right of UNION do not have the same number of result columns*))
